mapper.sql: id as id, outbound_id as outboundId, invoice_code as invoiceCode, invoice_date as invoiceDate, invoice_no as invoiceNo, payer as payer, item as item, qty as qty, unit_price as unitPrice, amt as amt, memo as memo, payee as payee, drawer as drawer, company as company
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_outbound_invoice ( id, outbound_id , invoice_code , invoice_date , invoice_no , payer , item , qty , unit_price , amt , memo , payee , drawer , company ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outboundId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{invoiceCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invoiceDate,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invoiceNo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{payer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{qty,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{unitPrice,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{amt,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{memo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{payee,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{drawer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{company,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_outbound_invoice SET outbound_id = #{outboundId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , invoice_code = #{invoiceCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , invoice_date = #{invoiceDate,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , invoice_no = #{invoiceNo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , payer = #{payer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , item = #{item,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , qty = #{qty,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , unit_price = #{unitPrice,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , amt = #{amt,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , memo = #{memo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , payee = #{payee,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , drawer = #{drawer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , company = #{company,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id}
